name: Platform Play
description: Turn your tool into a platform that enables third-party extensions and plugins
example: Shopify App Store turning an e-commerce tool into an ecosystem
trigger_question: What would make this a platform instead of a tool?

name: AI Integration
description: Add intelligent automation prediction and generation capabilities powered by machine learning
example: Gmail Smart Compose predicting what you want to type next
trigger_question: What could be smarter?

name: Marketplace
description: Connect users to each other to create powerful network effects and two-sided value
example: Airbnb connecting hosts and travelers creating exponential growth
trigger_question: What would make users bring their team/friends/family?

name: Real-time Collaboration
description: Enable multiple users to simultaneously edit and work together in the same space
example: Google Docs multi-cursor real-time collaborative editing
trigger_question: How do users work together?

name: Mobile-First Rewrite
description: Build a native mobile experience from the ground up rather than adapting desktop

name: API Economy

name: Data Moat
